DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to obtain more data about efficacy and safety of the study drug Lyrica.
DOC.brief_title: Non-Interventional Study In Patients With Peripheral Or Central Neuropathic Pain Treated With Lyrica
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of peripheral or central neuropathic pain None. Patients recruited by physician decision. Patient's personal data are not collected.
